attributes.action: Set a date to end PPI claims. We are all fed up with the constant phone calls.
attributes.background: PPI has been going on far too long. I can not understand why all of the people affected could not submit their claim within two years of the decision to refund it. The constant hounding but companies trying to make money out of the affair is tiresome.

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA), which is independent. 

You can read the FCA's most recent statement here:

https://www.fca.org.uk/news/statements/financial-conduct-authority-statement-ppi
